text:
@nytimes What Trump undid - 16 years of pandemic planning & infrastructure from Bush to Obama:
‘If we wait for a pandemic to appear, it will be too late to prepare’ — George W. Bush warned about getting ahead of something like COVID-19 way back in 2005  https://t.co/p399l2Vjox
